pt.uc.dei.mobilerobotsimulator

Class Environment

  • java.lang.Object
    • pt.uc.dei.mobilerobotsimulator.Environment

  • public class Environment
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the environment, which is a 2D matrix and contains all of the entities.
    Author:
    Karin Piškur (2014190802) and Pedro de Oliveira Estêvão (2011157312)
